CINK

MODULE CINK-LANG-SYNTAX

SYNTAX Decl ::= int Exps
| void Exps
| bool Exps

SYNTAX Val ::= cout
| cin
| Bool
| String
| Int

SYNTAX Exp ::= Id
| Val
| ( Exp )
| Id ( Exps ) [ strict(1) ]
| & Exp
| * Exp [ strict ]
| ++ Exp
| Exp * Exp
| Exp / Exp
| Exp % Exp
| Exp + Exp
| Exp - Exp
| Exp > Exp
| Exp <= Exp
| Exp == Exp
| ! Exp [ strict ]
| Exp && Exp [ strict(1) ]
| Exp || Exp [ strict(1) ]
| Exp << Exp [ seqstrict ]
| Exp >> Exp
| Exp = Exp
| endl

SYNTAX #Id ::= main

SYNTAX Stmt ::= Exp ; [ strict ]
| #include <iostream>
| using namespace std ;
| Decl ;
| { }
| { Stmts }
| while ( Exp ) Stmt
| return Exps ;
| Decl ( Decls ) { Stmts }
| if ( Exp ) Stmt else Stmt [ strict(1) ]
| if ( Exp ) Stmt
| std::thread Id ( Exps ) ;

SYNTAX Pgm ::= Stmts

SYNTAX Stmts ::= Stmt
| Stmts Stmts

SYNTAX Exps ::= List{#Exp,","} [ strict ]

SYNTAX Decls ::= List{#Decl,","}

END MODULE

MODULE CINK-LANG-SEMANTICS

SYNTAX LVal ::= loc ( Int )

SYNTAX Val ::= void
| undefined
| LVal
| lambda ( Decls @ Stmts )

SYNTAX Vals ::= List{#Val,","}

SYNTAX KResult ::= Val

SYNTAX Exp ::= lvalue ( Exp )
| rvalue ( Exp ) [ strict ]

SYNTAX K ::= execute
| noname

SYNTAX ListItem ::= ( List , K )
| [ Map ]

SYNTAX Bool ::= isDeclLabel ( KLabel ) [ function ]

RULE
isDeclLabel ( KL )
true
when KL ==KLabel 'int_ orElseBool KL ==KLabel 'bool_ orElseBool KL ==KLabel 'void_ [ anywhere ]

MODULE CINK-SYNTAX

SYNTAX Prop ::= eqTo ( Id , Val )

END MODULE

MODULE CINK

SYNTAX #ModelCheckerState ::= KItem ( Bag )

SYNTAX #Prop ::= #eqTo ( Id , Val ) [ function ]

RULE
eqTo ( X , V )
#eqTo ( X , V )
[ anywhere ]

T

, X )

[ anywhere ]
